column1: '''Celandine Brandybuck''' was the third and youngest child of [[Seredic Brandybuck]] and [[Hilda Bracegirdle]].
Celandine was descended from the line of the [[Master of Buckland
column2: Masters of the Hall of Buckland]]: specifically, from [[Gorbadoc Brandybuck]]. Along with her parents and her brothers [[Doderic Brandybuck
column4: Ilberic]], she was present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App
